script:
;;第２話
;;//背景街
# script "lisp"
# background "town"
# bgm "bgm002" 0
# body 24
# pos 24 3
# scale 24 0.8 0
# body 95
# pos 95 5
# scale 95 0.8 0
# body 103211
# pos 103211 1
# alpha 103211 0 0
# body 103311
# pos 103311 1
# scale 103311 0.8 0
# body 601611
# pos 601611 1
# scale 601611 0.8 0
# body 810004
# pos 810004 5
# scale 810004 0.8 0
# body 202311
# pos 202311 3
# scale 202311 0.8 0
# alpha 601611 0 0
# alpha 810004 0 0
# alpha 202311 0 0
# face 95 "usual"
# face 103311 "usual"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
# chara 24
# face 24 "angry"
@ティルフィング
処理…完了

# emotionbody 5200 3 95 10 290
# effectpattern 5200 1 3
# effectstart 5200
# textboxarrow 0 3
# voice 1032 "sakura_0006"
# chara 103211
# face 95 "happy"
@サクラ
よっしゃ！
私にかかればこんなもんよ

# effectskip 5200
# imageset 0 "black"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 1
# textboxarrow 0 1
# voice 1033 "chloe_kyara_0020"
# chara 103311
# face 103311 "normal"
@クロエ
これも日々の鍛錬の成果です！

# serif 0
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 0 1 0
# imagepos 0 0 30
# imageleftin 0 0.5
# waitandnext 1

# imagerightout 0 0.5
# serif 0
# textwindow "nomal"
# se "SE_0617"
# bgm "bgm031" 0.7
# alpha 24 0 0
# alpha 103311 0 0
# alpha 95 0 0
# alpha 601611 1 0
# alpha 810004 1 0
# rightin 810004 0.5
# face 601611 "surprise"
# textboxarrow 0 3
# chara 810004
@異族
グギィィィッ…！

# alpha 24 1 0.5
# alpha 103311 1 0.5
# alpha 95 1 0.5
# alpha 601611 0 0.3
# alpha 810004 0 0.3
# face 103311 "angry"
# face 95 "angry"
# textboxarrow 0 2
# voice 1014 "tyrufing_0024"
# chara 24
# face 24 "mad2"
@ティルフィング
いけない！
異族がレナさんの方にっ…

# alpha 24 0 0.3
# alpha 103311 0 0.3
# alpha 95 0 0.3
# alpha 601611 1 0.5
# alpha 810004 1 0
# move 810004 4 0.7
# voice 6016 "rena_0023"
# textboxarrow 0 1
# chara 601611
# face 601611 "sad"
@レナ
ヤだ…来ないでっ

# shake 0 1
# se "SE_4602"
# fadein "red" 0.5
# alpha 202311 1 0
# leftin 202311 0.3
# move 810004 5 0.5
# layer 202311 4
# layer 601611 2
# layer 810004 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
# voice 2023 "shayna_battle_0004"
# chara 202311
# face 202311 "angry"
@？？？
ちぇすとーっ！
